RARE_CATEGORY: Anomaly detected: The category '{category}' appears in only {frequency} out of {total_categories} records, which is unusually rare.
UNUSUAL_CATEGORY_FORMAT: Anomaly detected: The category '{category}' uses an unusual format pattern compared to most category values in the dataset.
